tableSqls: create table if not exists user(id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name TEXT, password TEXT, salt TEXT, createTime TEXT);
create table if not exists project(id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name TEXT, describe TEXT, folder TEXT, workspace TEXT, checkDir TEXT, createTime TEXT);
create table if not exists history(id TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, projectId TEXT, projectName TEXT, fileUrl TEXT, result INTEGER, operatorId TEXT, operator TEXT, describe TEXT, createTime TEXT);
